metadata.title: Running coupling constants for charm robustness study
sources: PDG 2024 Review: Electroweak Model and Constraints on New Physics (rpp2024-rev-standard-model.pdf)
notes: alpha_hat values are MS-bar running QED coupling

alpha_hat_m_tau.description: MS-bar QED coupling at mu=m_tau with 4 active quark flavors
alpha_hat_m_tau.note: Interpolated from PDG running; 4 flavors active below m_b

alpha_hat_m_Z.description: MS-bar QED coupling at mu=m_Z with 5 active quark flavors

alpha_s_m_Z.description: Strong coupling constant at mu=m_Z (world average)

alpha_s_m_tau.description: Strong coupling at mu=m_tau from tau decays

qcd_running_parameters.description: Parameters for MS-bar quark mass running

gamma_m_0.description: 1-loop mass anomalous dimension coefficient (gamma_m = gamma_m_0 * alpha_s / pi)

notes: This is the leading-order result; higher orders add O(alpha_s) corrections
